description:
SecurityManager.notWhenRecovery(address) (modules/SecurityManager.sol#85-88) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(recoveryConfigs[_wallet].executeAfter == 0,SM: ongoing recovery) (modules/SecurityManager.sol#86)
markdown:
[SecurityManager.notWhenRecovery(address)](contracts/modules/SecurityManager.sol#L85-L88) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [require(bool,string)(recoveryConfigs[_wallet].executeAfter == 0,SM: ongoing recovery)](contracts/modules/SecurityManager.sol#L86)

description:
RelayerManager.validateSession(address,bytes32,bytes) (modules/RelayerManager.sol#309-313) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- (signer == session.key && session.expires >= block.timestamp) (modules/RelayerManager.sol#312)
markdown:
[RelayerManager.validateSession(address,bytes32,bytes)](contracts/modules/RelayerManager.sol#L309-L313) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [(signer == session.key && session.expires >= block.timestamp)](contracts/modules/RelayerManager.sol#L312)

description: RelayerManager.execute(address,bytes,uint256,bytes,uint256,uint256,address,address).stack (modules/RelayerManager.sol#100) is a local variable never initialized
markdown: [RelayerManager.execute(address,bytes,uint256,bytes,uint256,uint256,address,address).stack](contracts/modules/RelayerManager.sol#L100) is a local variable never initialized

description: BaseModule.recoverToken(address) (modules/common/BaseModule.sol#137-140) ignores return value by ERC20(_token).transfer(address(registry),total) (modules/common/BaseModule.sol#139)

BaseWallet.invoke(address,uint256,bytes) (wallet/BaseWallet.sol#126-137) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- (success,_result) = _target.call{value: _value}(_data) (wallet/BaseWallet.sol#128)
markdown:
[BaseWallet.invoke(address,uint256,bytes)](contracts/wallet/BaseWallet.sol#L126-L137) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- [(success,_result) = _target.call{value: _value}(_data)](contracts/wallet/BaseWallet.sol#L128)

description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract Proxy (wallet/Proxy.sol#25-52) has payable functions:
	 - Proxy.fallback() (wallet/Proxy.sol#35-46)
	 - Proxy.receive() (wallet/Proxy.sol#48-50)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract [Proxy](contracts/wallet/Proxy.sol#L25-L52) has payable functions:
	 - [Proxy.fallback()](contracts/wallet/Proxy.sol#L35-L46)
	 - [Proxy.receive()](contracts/wallet/Proxy.sol#L48-L50)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

description:
setAddr(bytes32,address) should be declared external:
	- ArgentENSResolver.setAddr(bytes32,address) (infrastructure/ens/ArgentENSResolver.sol#48-51)

setName(bytes32,string) should be declared external:
	- ArgentENSResolver.setName(bytes32,string) (infrastructure/ens/ArgentENSResolver.sol#58-61)

addr(bytes32) should be declared external:
	- ArgentENSResolver.addr(bytes32) (infrastructure/ens/ArgentENSResolver.sol#68-70)

name(bytes32) should be declared external:
	- ArgentENSResolver.name(bytes32) (infrastructure/ens/ArgentENSResolver.sol#77-79)

supportsInterface(bytes4) should be declared external:
	- ArgentENSResolver.supportsInterface(bytes4) (infrastructure/ens/ArgentENSResolver.sol#86-88)

getImplementations() should be declared external:
	- ArgentWalletDetector.getImplementations() (infrastructure/ArgentWalletDetector.sol#112-114)

getCodes() should be declared external:
	- ArgentWalletDetector.getCodes() (infrastructure/ArgentWalletDetector.sol#119-121)

isAvailable(bytes32) should be declared external:
	- ArgentENSManager.isAvailable(bytes32) (infrastructure/ens/ArgentENSManager.sol#151-158)

GuardianStorage (infrastructure_0.5/storage/GuardianStorage.sol#29-152) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- config.info[_guardian].index = uint128(config.guardians.push(_guardian) - 1) (infrastructure_0.5/storage/GuardianStorage.sol#60)
markdown:
[GuardianStorage](contracts/infrastructure_0.5/storage/GuardianStorage.sol#L29-L152) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- [config.info[_guardian].index = uint128(config.guardians.push(_guardian) - 1)](contracts/infrastructure_0.5/storage/GuardianStorage.sol#L60)

description: ModuleRegistry.recoverToken(address) (infrastructure_0.5/ModuleRegistry.sol#88-91) ignores return value by ERC20(_token).transfer(msg.sender,total) (infrastructure_0.5/ModuleRegistry.sol#90)
